author: dlr
msg: Corrected compilation errors reported by today's GUMP run which were

(introduced during recent addition of its functionality).
Nothing but goodness can come from the merger of these two classes;
hopefully Avalon will eventually adopt Commons IO's FileUtils,

msg: Oops. Now the licence without FileUtils :)
